MAN.TITLE: show_nodes

DESCRIPTION.P: show_nodes highlights the set of nodes nodes of the displayed graph in the current window. If the optional argument sup is equal to the string "sup", the highlighting is superposed on the previous one.

This function can also be called to unhighlight highlighted nodes by using the call show_nodes([]). Note also that when a set of node is highlighted, the automatic highlight during mouse move is not performed. Calling show_nodes([]) restores the automatic highlight during mouse move.
